title: health check api should return server status
description: Verify that the GET /api/health endpoint returns a 200 status code with a JSON object containing the server status and message indicating the server is running.

title: user registration should create new user with valid data
description: Test POST /api/auth/register with valid user data including name, email, password, role, and optional skills. Expect 201 response and user creation. Also test validation errors and duplicate user scenarios.

title: user login should return jwt token for valid credentials
description: Test POST /api/auth/login with valid email and password to receive a JWT token. Verify 200 response for success, 401 for invalid credentials, and 403 if account is blocked.

title: get current user should return authenticated user profile
description: Test GET /api/auth/me with valid JWT token to retrieve the authenticated user's profile. Expect 200 response with user data, 401 if unauthorized.

title: update profile should modify user information
description: Test PUT /api/auth/profile with valid JWT token and profile update data (name, bio, skills). Expect 200 response confirming profile update, 401 if unauthorized.

title: get all jobs should return filtered job list
description: Test GET /api/jobs with optional query parameters (search, category, status) and valid JWT token. Verify 200 response with list of jobs matching filters, 401 if unauthorized.

title: create job should allow client to post new job
description: Test POST /api/jobs with client role JWT token and valid job data (title, category, description, budget, deadline). Expect 201 response for job creation, 403 if user is not client.

title: place bid should allow freelancer to bid on job
description: Test POST /api/bids with freelancer role JWT token and valid bid data (jobId, amount, message). Expect 201 response for successful bid, 403 if user is not freelancer, 404 if job not found.

title: send message should allow user to message regarding job
description: Test POST /api/messages with valid JWT token and message data (jobId, receiverId, message). Expect 201 response for message sent, 403 if access denied, 404 if job not found.

title: admin dashboard should return platform statistics
description: Test GET /api/admin/dashboard with admin role JWT token. Expect 200 response with dashboard statistics, 403 if user is not admin.
